Note: SRA splits this information into `platform` and `instrument_model`, however the controlled vocabulary of the latter one also often contains the `platform` information. Therefore preference was given to a 1:1 mapping using `instrument_model`
SRA keyword `library_source` is related to this field, but makes a number of distinctions (bulk vs. single-cell) that are incompatible with the current definition of `template_class`

SRA keyword `library_strategy` is related to this field, but uses a controlled vocubulary that is not fine-grained enough to provide the required information of MiAIRR `library_generation_method` (e.g. mode of cDNA generation, UMI, etc.)
